title: What are some horror or thriller-type novels for a 14-year-old boy? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no such age limit when it comes to reading! I started collecting novels when I was barely 13, so now let's come to your question, it depends on what you have read till now, I mean if you are into Indian authors then go for Chetan Bhagat’s The girl in room 105; basically this one contains criminal, thriller story . And if you understand high class English go for Agatha Christie's Murder on the orient express. This will definitely amaze you! Happy reading :)
You must read ‘And then there were none’ by Agatha cristie. It's a masterpiece!! Genre- mystery /thriller. YOU MUST!!!
